author: noel
msg: New patch from Hontvari Jozsef.  Use reflection only at the time of the class initialization.  Enhance the heuristic a bit, it considers the case when the first words were not encoded, only the next ones.

author: noel
msg: New patch from Hontvari Jozsef.  Use reflection only at the time of the class initialization.  Enhance the heuristic a bit, it considers the case when the first words were not encoded, only the next ones.

author: noel
msg: Removed large volume of debugging code.

author: noel
msg: Add the ability to authorize networks using a new <authorizedAddresses> element.  SMTP AUTH can be enabled generally, and then disabled for authorized networks.

author: noel
msg: New utility class for matching IP addresses against networks specified in any of several formats.
